query:
-- Verificar se há personais com mesmo email
SELECT 
  u.email,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  GROUP_CONCAT(p.id) as personal_ids,
  GROUP_CONCAT(u.id) as user_ids,
  GROUP_CONCAT(p.subscriptionStatus) as statuses
FROM personals p
JOIN users u ON p.userId = u.id
WHERE u.email IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY u.email
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
ORDER BY count DESC;

  GROUP_CONCAT(u.id) as user_ids,
  GROUP_CONCAT(p.subscriptionStatus) as statuses
FROM personals p
JOIN users u ON p.userId = u.id
WHERE u.email IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY u.email
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
ORDER BY count DESC;
